headline: Camden Property Trust (CPT) Valuation After Earnings Beat Sunbelt Shift And $600 Million Buyback
summary: Why Camden’s latest quarter is getting investor attention Camden Property Trust (CPT) drew fresh investor focus after funds from operations for the fourth quarter topped Wall Street expectations and management laid out a new capital plan centered on Sunbelt properties and share repurchases. See our latest analysis for Camden Property Trust. Those fourth quarter results, the new $600 million buyback plan, and a higher first quarter 2026 dividend come after a mixed year in the market.
